loading-timer.title: Loading Timer
loading-timer.world_message_text: It took %d seconds to load into/generate this world
loading-timer.resource_loading_text: It took approximately %d seconds to load the resource pack(s)
loading-timer.config.insane_precision.de: Takes precision to a whole new level
loading-timer.config.world_load_time.des: Measures how long it takes to load into a world
loading-timer.config.resource_load_notif: Measures how long it takes to load into resource packs

Usually at startup, the resource loading time doesn't 
show up at startup to prevent toast spam.

This setting won't work unless 'Resource Loading Timer' is on
loading-timer.config.resource_load_perce:
Prints out how much of the resource pack has been loaded.
Just like how Minecraft prints out how much of the world has been generated in singleplayer
loading-timer.config.raw_loading_toast.d: Replaces the 'total' values shown at startup with the 'raw' values
